Santiago Choapam Hotel

Our team has selected for you a list of hotel in Santiago Choapam classified by value for money. Book your hotel room at the best price.

Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Llano Grande

Llano Grande

Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Llano Grande is located at the Cerro Yatin mountain-skirt, 1 hour and 10 minutes’ drive from Oaxaca de Juárez. It features an on-site restaurant and free daily breakfast. The rustic-style cottages have fireplaces... view morefrom

$US 56Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Amatlán

San Miguel Amatlán

Offering a restaurant and free daily breakfast, Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Amatlán is located in San Miguel Amatlán, 1 hours’ drive from Oaxaca de Juárez. The rustic-style cottages are built with adobe bricks and have fireplaces... view morefrom

$US 56Cabaña San Mateo Yetla

San Juan Bautista Valle Nacional

Offering a swimming pool, an extensive garden with camping area and free Wi-Fi throughout, Cabaña San Mateo Yetla is located 1.5 km from San Juan Bautista Valle Nacional Town Centre... view morefrom

$US 35Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Cuajimoloyas

Cuajimoloyas

Offering free breakfast, an extensive garden and free Access to Ecopark, Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Cuajimoloyas is located 1 km from San Antonino Cuajimolayas town centre... view morefrom

$US 61Cabaña Vega del sol - Zuzul

Santa María Jacatepec

Cabaña Vega del Sol – Zuzul is located inside Chichintla Nature Reserve and 12 km from San Jose Chiltepec and features extensive garden, camping area and free Wi-Fi throughout. The rooms offer basic décor, wooden floor and a private bathroom... view morefrom
